thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com
thread.title: Larry Frazeea

author: Larry Frazeea
title: Larry Frazeea
text: Ordered new service was misled on equiplmet I was to receive, was told would get a gift card that will not happen . and finally, none of the movie channels were on my service as promised. The installer was embarrassed because they had screwed up on my order so badly. Had to contact dish net work directly in Phoenix to get it all straightened out. The installer took 4 hours because the order was so messed up. He was the only good part about my experience. Still will not get the gift cert That I was promised.
